com.tomtom.speedtools.geometry

Class GeoHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.geometry.GeoHash

  • public final class GeoHash
extends Object
    This class deals with GeoHash functionality. Base source taken from LBS team (thanks Eric Bowman). See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash and http://geospatialweb.googlecode.com.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeoHash(GeoPoint point)
      Create a GeoHash from a point.
      GeoHash(String hash)
      Create a GeoHash from a hash string.

    • Method Detail

      • getHash

        @Nonnull
public String getHash()
        Return the geo hash string of this object. This is not the same as the hashCode.
        Returns:
        Geo hash string.

      • getPoint

        @Nonnull
public GeoPoint getPoint()
        Return the point (coordinate) of this geo hash.
        Returns:
        GeoPoint coordinate.

      • moveTo

        @Nonnull
public GeoHash moveTo(@Nonnull
                               GeoPoint point)
        Creates a new GeoHash using the same resolution (length) as the current object to contain a new point. This method essentially moves the GeoHash rectangle around if needed.
        Parameters:
        point - Point to be contained by new object.
        Returns:
        New GeoHash with same resolution that contains the specified point.

      • useResolution

        @Nonnull
public GeoHash useResolution(@Nonnull
                                      GeoHash other)
        Returns a new GeoHash object with the same resolution as the specified object.
        Parameters:
        other - GeoHash object that specifies the resolution.
        Returns:
        New GeoHash object with same resolution.

      • decreaseResolution

        @Nullable
public GeoHash decreaseResolution()
        Shortens the size of the GeoHash by one character, effectively decreasing the resolution.
        Returns:
        GeoHash with one character removed from the right. May be null.

      • decreaseResolution

        @Nullable
public GeoHash decreaseResolution(int amount)
        Shortens the size of the GeoHash, so removes characters from the right, effectively decreasing the resolution.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of characters to remove, must be 0 or bigger.
        Returns:
        GeoHash with characters removed from the right. May be null.

      • setResolution

        @Nullable
public GeoHash setResolution(int length)
        Shortens the size of the GeoHash by an absolute value, so removes characters from the right.
        Parameters:
        length - The new size of the GeoHash, must be > 0.
        Returns:
        GeoHash with characters removed from the right.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(@Nonnull
                        GeoHash other)
        Specifies whether a GeoHash is contained within this one. Note that a GeoHash always contains itself.
        Parameters:
        other - Other GeoHash.
        Returns:
        True if this GeoHash contains the other one.

      • length

        public int length()
        Gets the hash length.
        Returns:
        The length in number of characters.

public static String encode(@Nonnull
                                     GeoPoint point)
        Encodes a GeoPoint into a geoHash string.
        Parameters:
        point - GeoPoint to be encoded.
        Returns:
        The created String.

public static String encode(double lat,

      • decode

        @Nonnull
public static GeoPoint decode(@Nonnull
                                       String hash)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Decodes a geoHash string into a GeoPoint.
        Parameters:
        hash - String representation of a GeoHash.
        Returns:
        The created GeoPoint.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when an invalid hash was given.

                              String hash)
        Return whether a hash is a valid Geo Hash.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
